argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lvecpropd.1 | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 2 |  | lvecpropd.2 | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) |
| 3 |  | lvecpropd.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` K ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) ) |
| 4 |  | lvecpropd.4 | |- ( ph -> F = ( Scalar ` K ) ) |
| 5 |  | lvecpropd.5 | |- ( ph -> F = ( Scalar ` L ) ) |
| 6 |  | lvecpropd.6 | |- P = ( Base ` F ) |
| 7 |  | lvecpropd.7 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. P /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( .s ` K ) y ) = ( x ( .s ` L ) y ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_lmodpropd | |- ( ph -> ( K e. LMod <-> L e. LMod ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 5 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( Scalar ` K ) = ( Scalar ` L ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( Scalar ` K ) e. DivRing <-> ( Scalar ` L ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( ph -> ( ( K e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` K ) e. DivRing ) <-> ( L e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` L ) e. DivRing ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` K ) = ( Scalar ` K ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_islvec | |- ( K e. LVec <-> ( K e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` K ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` L ) = ( Scalar ` L ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_islvec | |- ( L e. LVec <-> ( L e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` L ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 16 | 11, 13, 15 | #P_3bitr4g | |- ( ph -> ( K e. LVec <-> L e. LVec ) ) |
